headline.main: FRENCH FUNDS GO TO STATE LOANS; Plethora of Money With Little Other Outlet Shown by New Interest Cuts

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 5 -- Simultaneously with the issue of the new 4 per cent bonds of the Autonomous Sinking Fund redeemable in fifty years, a decision by the Minister of Finance reduced from 1 3/4 to 1 5/8 per cent the rate of interest of the ordinary treasury bonds running from 75 to 105 days.
abstract: Autonomous Sinking Fund bonds issued; Finance Min cuts rate on treas bonds; 2 measures connected with consol move
